website_summaries.verdict: Avoid the complex and troublesome to clean Hurom H-AA Slow Juicer in favor of better performing models such as the Omega J8006.
pros: The Hurom H-AA Slow Juicer effectively extracts liquid from citrus and hard fruits and vegetables
The cold-press juicer also runs quietly compared with noisy centrifugal machines
cons: The Hurom H-AA Slow Juicer has trouble pulling juice from leafy greens
It's also expensive and has a complicated design and hand-wash-only accessories

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Service from Amazon and Hurom USA
customer_reviews.text: The juicer arrived very quickly in New Zealand - less than a week. The first time I used this juicer it juiced fine but smelt of burning. I turned it off and took it outside and black smoke came out of it. I have contacted Amazon, who told me to contact Hurom. I have contacted Hurom USA three times and had no reply. I have contacted Hurom NZ who told me they can’t help because I bought it from Amazon USA (we don’t have a NZ Amazon). This juicer was extremely expensive and I can’t use it, yet it is still within the warranty period???????
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Issues
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed this does not juice celery pulp builds up around the auger. It’s hard to get the auger out to clean.
customer_reviews.author: becca

customer_reviews.title: So far, SO good!
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is amazingly quiet and efficient. I find it pretty easy to clean, too, which is important when you have a toddler to chase after. The most astonishing part, however, is how well it extracts greens down into juice. I've only had it a couple days and already am using it multiple times per day, can't wait to try it out for almond milk too. Best juicer I've ever tried, so far, though, has all the qualities I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Juicing nirvana
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 juicers and this by far is the best. This juicer provides a consistent high quality juice with a high yield and the BESTpart is it is simple to clean. I love it. I give this juicer a four because after a few months the engine has increased noise and has a slight rattle. I am not sure how this will work out in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: I love this slow juicer
customer_reviews.text: I love this slow juicer! Granted, it’s the only slow juicer I’ve ever used but I use it everyday. You learn with time which order to juice your vegetables to avoid pulp buildup in the auger. I like to use the finer blade to avoid pulpy juice so yes, my auger does need to be emptied if I’m juicing excess celery, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Pnw

customer_reviews.title: Thed best low speed juicer ever
customer_reviews.text: Thus is my second low speed juicer and it is fantastic, much better than an older Hurom model. I use it every single day making juices from vegetables (carrots, kale,...) and fruits (oranges, apples, grapes,...). Again, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good juicer, horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: It’s really good for leafy greens like kale or spinach but horrible for celery and cucumbers. Hurom does have the worst customer service I have experienced though. I’ve called several times and have had issues with the motor blending and they’ve never done anything about it while it was under their 2 year warranty and 10 year motor warranty. It’s a good juicer but based on customer service I’ll never buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Cliffy

customer_reviews.title: handy juicer
customer_reviews.text: nice juicer. its quiet and easy to clean. Wish I could put the items in the dishwasher when I am in a hurry, but the drying stand helps keep it in a small space for drying and it doesn't take too long to clean. I really like to make the almond milk, it is really great for that, it is so easy and much less expensive and you can make it how you like it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cox

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design  and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my new juicer!! It’s sleek design looks great on my counter, I’m obsessed with celery juice and carrot juice, I make soup with the leftovers, and the clean up is so easy!! There are about 5 pieces that just need to be rinced off. When making celery, since it’s a very fibrous vege, it needs to be cut small so the strings and get expulsed. Any juicer you buy will be this way.... I can not say enough about this juicer! I now love cleaning out my refrigerator to see what I can juice next!! Making ice cream tonight!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Zalewski

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled by "slow"...it's great!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first 'slow' juicer and it didn't feel like I waited any longer for my juice than my centrifuge juicer. BUT...the remaining pulp was MUCH drier so I know I got all the juice from my veggies and I couldn't say that before today. Super excited to keep using it! Here's to health in the Covid-19 pandemic era!
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My mom recommended me to buy this slow juicer. And I really LOVE it! My little one who doesn't like to eat fruit and vegetables, and never drink juice made by vitamix or ninja blender HOWEVER!!! She loves the juice that made by this slow juicer which amazed me! I would like to say, this is the BEST gift ever for my whole family. BTW, It‘s super easy to clean, not so heavy. Love it soooooo much! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pyj H

customer_reviews.title: This has to be some cruel joke!
customer_reviews.text: WTF?! I was so excited to get this juicer and the box showed it was the one I ordered in inside was a completely different juicer! It was the Hurom brand, but it was an older model-I think even the portable one! The model numbers do not match at all. No idea how this would happen but definitely sending back!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaytlynn Griem

customer_reviews.title: Does not work 220v
customer_reviews.text: When I decided to buy this item I checked if that would work in another country for 220v. So apparently it was. When I brought it home to my country I plugged in and nothing it was not working. I bought a converter from amazon that was shipped to the other side of the world to Mauritius. The converter got broken at the 3rd time. So disappointed with Hurom
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Superior juicer
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, the best juicer I've ever used. Easy to use, easy to clean. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Ra Man

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this juicer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this juicer. After getting overwhelmed by so much information out there about various juicers—I decided to purchase this one. No regrets! It's easy to use, the clean up isn't as overwhelming as it seemed at first. Highly recommend it. My mom recently bought this exact model and loves it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Product came late and broken.
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment ;( This is my first juicer and yet not only it came later than the guaranteed delivery date but also the nozzle lid was broken. Thankfully it's not a major part and the juicer performs well -- 1 more star for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy !!!!
customer_reviews.text: The accessories broke easily and I don’t find where to buy them !!! You cant replace or fix them .
customer_reviews.author: Camila

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Give me a good juice, just got it 1month so durability???? Will update later that why I give 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: LouBylou

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: The machine received with a defected top, after contact the Hurom office in Torrance, I went to the office and got the machine tested found the magnet is gone on the top cover, they replaced a new machine at the site. Great customer service, although this is a great machine worth five stars but the QC should be improved, this is the reason I only rated four stars
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: This is the greatest juicer ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest juicer ever! I had an older Hurom that we used daily. This model is much quieter and has little pulp if you want. Also it's just plain beautiful on my counter!!
customer_reviews.author: cindy richman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing juicer. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Its manual is all encompassing and fully delineates everything you need to know to keep it running like a champ. It juices everything from ginger roots to jalapeno to apples and oranges. The pulp comes out fully dry. I was amazed the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Chryssiana McGilvrey

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It works very quickly for a slow juicer. Easy tear down and clean up. I have owned other juicers that is very time consuming on clean up. Not this juicer. Thanks hurom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: requires a bit more preparation work as compared to centrifugal juicers but the juice produced is great.
customer_reviews.text: A bit expensive, requires a bit more preparation work as compared to centrifugal juicers but the juice produced is great.
customer_reviews.author: Cinical

customer_reviews.title: It's not A juicer, it's the ONLY juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, but the quality and design are worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Naama

customer_reviews.title: Too pricy for it to Malfunction with Apples
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and the color choices, I didn't like when I juiced apples it hesitated and the apple slices got stuck and made a loud sound that I needed to shut it off. It juiced carrots so nicely and they are harder, the apples was an issue. Also, it was hard to disassemble after I was done with juicing, I could not twist the top off as it was so stuck with the fruit and veggie grounds.. the grounds also got stuck in the motor part.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, put together, and easy to clean. Worth the money if you do a lot of juicing.
customer_reviews.author: C. B.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I'm thoroughly happy with my juicer! I returned another brand to the store that was much slower. This one is much faster without losing the benefits of the nutrients as you do with centrifugal juicers. It's very easy to clean up. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: jlareau246

customer_reviews.title: It’s very easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: The juicer is fantastic! My husband and children love the juce it makes.
customer_reviews.author: Ju Yeon Park

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: It’s been 11 months and the motor stopped?? Can we get a replacement? Is this normal?
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Oakeley

customer_reviews.title: Hurom is a good quality juicer.
customer_reviews.text: I love hurom. My first juicer from them has lasted me ten years (just passed it on to a friend). This newer version for me seems to be of egalitarian quality and produces good juice. Thanks for making a quality product that last...
customer_reviews.author: Marie A Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great juicer. I bought another model for my parents first. Got to use it a lot with them and then purchased this one. Very happy with it. Makes amazing juice
customer_reviews.author: Dan Cox

customer_reviews.title: I found this great recipe online using frozen yogurt and raspberry cubes to ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this for so long and finally I bought it for my family. I made juice every morning for 5 days already. I feel a lot healthier!! I was afraid that it might be hard to clean but it takes less than 3 mins. One thing, I was little confused with the ice cream strainer. But, I found this great recipe online using frozen yogurt and raspberry cubes to make ice cream with Hurom! Since I love taking pictures, here are some pictures that I've took just now! It taste AMAZING.... I love the fact that there is no preservatives or additives. Hope everybody gets healthier with Hurom! Thank you Hurom!!
customer_reviews.author: Choi, H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this juicer, great value for the money. I had a marked auger and customer service was quick to respond.
customer_reviews.author: SadBuyer

customer_reviews.title: great juicer
customer_reviews.text: been using it for a week now great so far enjoying my juices much more now tastes better
customer_reviews.author: Diania

customer_reviews.title: It's Easy to use.  The cleanup is easy.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the product. It is easy to follow and clean up is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Olson

customer_reviews.title: I love this juicer
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer! Its true that it cleans up in just a few minutes. I even take it with me when I travel! I love that its a small foot print since I don't have much counter space. I recommended it to a friend and she got one! Dont hesitate! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Weleba

customer_reviews.title: I was not impressed with this product at all. ...
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed with this product at all. I had really high expectations with it. I currently use a VitaMix and will just continue to mix then remove pulp myself.
customer_reviews.author: B Flores

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time on this one!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a refurbished one because a new one was so very very expensive. But even still I pay $375 for the refurbished one. It does a terrible job, and is in sanely horrendous to clean. Mine worked for exactly 2 1/2 minutes before it died, and I spent an hour cleaning out what little tiny bit of Carrot was inside and it still wouldn't work. Also the mouth opening to feed your vegetables into this about the quarter of the size of my old fashion Breville. Don't waste your time on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This juicer sucks
customer_reviews.text: If you juice a lot of veggies be prepared to do a ton of chopping otherwise the juicer gets jammed constantly. I am giving it one start only because I noticed that when juicing fruit it extracted more juice than my favorite juicer. But I don't juice a lot of fruit, so I will stick to my favorite juicer the champion because I can actually juice a whole carrot without chopping it into a million pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but absolutely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I had a cheap typical juicer and I hated it. I got this and WOW. This thing gets SO MUCH juice and is actually super easy to clean. I think clean up took me five minutes! I know this is a pricey item, but locally squeezed juice for me is about 12 bucks a bottle. This makes it just as good, in my house, and has an amazing yield. I sat on buying this for a while because of the price point... Now I am wondering why I waited so long. Get one.
customer_reviews.author: Bex

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived more than a week early and I am amazed at how much juice it extracts! I've owned 2 Acme Juicerators, and the Hurom is hands down better juice quality, easier to clean and store. I'd recommend this awesome juicer in a second!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: I love this juicer
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer!!! Best one I have ever owned. It's quick, quiet, and easy to clean. Well worth the investment!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: johnodie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this juicer - it is very quiet and it produces some really good juices. It works with fruits and vegetables and it is very easy to clean (less than 5 minutes). The juicer comes with two filters and other accessories for making sorbets and tofu. The sorbets are really good (so far I've tried frozen bananas + strawberries + kiwi). As far as vegetables I have made some drinks using spinach, kale, broccoli, carrots, and apples - very delicious. Overall I am very happy with this juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Goog quality
customer_reviews.text: The best juicer I have ever had. Makes good tasting juices without the sugar. Cant beat the taste in comparison of store bought juices that have so much sugar and are not very healthy. The juicer cleans pretty easy and it easily taken apart and put back together. It is also of very good quality and of course it should be for that price. I was surprised of the motor running so quietly, you can barely hear it and he rose gold color is beautiful, I love this Juicer and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Best Juicer with easy cleanup. It's so easy to use and cleanup is a breeze. A great way to get loads of natural vitamins in you and your kids! Carrot, apple, ginger juice is the kids fav (and I throw in a bit of celery too). Juices greens beautifully. Love the design and holder for the components.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Bone Dry Pulp?
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is extremely quiet and easy to clean. I’ve owned many juicer in the past. I purchased this one because I wanted one of the best. I juiced mangos, strawberries , and pineapples. The pulp was so mushy. I can tell there was still a lot of juice that could have been extracted from it. I feel like I could have gotten more yield for what I put in.... i contacted them company. Hopefully they get back to me.
customer_reviews.author: Sera🌺

customer_reviews.title: Excellent juicer
customer_reviews.text: So excited about our new Hurom juicer!!! This is a beauty and does everything I need and more. Bye, bye juice bars! Cheers to good health!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Hibiscus

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for a Rookie Juicer like myself
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for a Rookie Juicer like myself. I clean it immediately after juicing, I can make my juice and have the Hurom taken apart and drying in under 30 minutes. My Vegan Sister-in-law is a lifetime juicer and she loves getting a chance to use this machine so that speaks very highly to it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ley

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, versatile
customer_reviews.text: Best juicer on the planet. Makes almond milk and we can use the pulp to make bread!!! Sturdy, easy to clean and surprisingly VERY quiet for a juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Lina Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome juicer
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday. Easy to clean and so many uses. Makes awesome banana nice cream and nut milk is a breeze. No more squeezing and straining. Very easy to clean. Would buy again in an instant
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer.
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer. Easy to clean and makes great juice. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jen13

customer_reviews.title: Juicer for the Stars (at least 4 of them)
customer_reviews.text: I like this juicer. It behaves like other juicers and it not extremely hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: B. Philp

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: Very neat and manageable juicer. Easy to set up and use and looks good too. Lots of parts ( good or not so good) depending on how involved you like to get. Easily washable.
customer_reviews.author: David Hardy

product_meta.title: Hurom H-AA Slow Juicer, Matte Black
product_meta.description: Color:Matte BlackThe sleek H-AA is Hurom's flagship model. It features the newest, most innovative technology on the market: Alpha technology. Alpha technology sports a sleek new design, optimized juicing, easier cleaning and the ability to make ice cream out of frozen ingredients. You'll be able to meet all of your juicing needs with ease and in style with the H-AA.
feature_bullets: Design: With a streamlined design that includes smooth curves that gradually become slimmer in the back, the H-AA brings you stylish, yet modern beauty
Natural: The H-AA rotates at a speed of just 43 revolutions per minute, designed This patented Slow Squeeze Technology ensures your juice retains all of its natural nutrients
The H-AA comes with a control lever and fine and coarse strainers that allow you to control the amount of pulp to suite your taste
Versatility: Works on fruits, vegetables, leafy greens, nuts and soybeans to create nutritious juices, milk, tofu, and more. The H-AA also has the ability to create ice cream with frozen ingredients

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars128 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
